scripts.copy-data: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join(__dirname,'..','OneApp data');const dest=path.join(__dirname,'OneApp data');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(f=>{const srcFile=path.join(src,f);const destFile=path.join(dest,f);if(fs.statSync(srcFile).isFile()){fs.copyFileSync(srcFile,destFile);}});console.log('Copied OneApp data folder');}"
